tool_description: Ontology-based text analysis service which creates a comprehensive, weighted profile. As an input for profiling you can use any text or link to a document like PDF or a web page.
name: SmartProfiles
title: SmartProfiles

api_list.name: /focus/api

required_parameters.name: target
required_parameters.description: Text to be profiled. Can also be an URL, in which case text on the page or document (PDF, .doc). in the page is profiled.

optional_parameters.name: targettype
optional_parameters.description: Determines whether the 'target' is text or a link to a page or a document. Possible values are 'text' for text mode, 'url' for link mode, 'pdf' for PDF mode or 'auto' for detecting the type of 'target' automatically. Default 'auto'.

optional_parameters.name: jsonp
optional_parameters.description: JSONP callback. Optional parameter, requires ‘jsonp’ as output format

optional_parameters.name: classification
optional_parameters.description: Select classification used. Possible values include ‘focus100k’, ‘iabtier1’, ‘iabtier2’, ‘iabtier2plus’. Default 'focus100k’

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language of the profiled text. Possible values are 'en' for English, 'fi' for Finnish, 'sv' for Swedish and 'de' for German. Default 'en'. Value 'auto’ attempts to detect the language automatically.
